abstract: Zimbabwean officials report poachers poisoned 22 elephants with cyanide in Hwange National Park, bringing countrywide total for October to 62.
lead_paragraph: The Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority said poachers had gotten away with three ivory tusks.

headline.main: Zimbabwe: Poachers’ Cyanide Kills 22 Elephants in Park
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe: Poachers’ Cyanide Kills 22 Elephants in Park

snippet: The Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority said poachers had gotten away with three ivory tusks.
